Post.title: hello-world
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: HEXOGithub
Post._content:
# HEXOGithub

## SSH

```
git config --global user.name "bengenseo"
git config --global user.email "bengenseo@126.com"
ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "bengenseo@126.com"
```

###  

```
ssh -T git@github.com
```

###  yes

Warning: Permanently added 'github.com' (ED25519) to the list of known hosts.
Hi bengenseo! You've successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access.
github.comED25519
 bengenseo GitHub  shell 

```
ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "bengenseo@126.com"
```

## 

```
npm install gulp
npm install gulpfile
npm install gulp-clean-css
npm install gulp-uglify
npm install gulp-concat
npm install hexo-cli -g
```

## .githubworkflows

### auto.yml

```
name: 
# masterAction
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
      #202010githubmain
  release:
    types:
      - published

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: 
        uses: actions/checkout@v2
        with:
          ref: main

      - name:  Node
        uses: actions/setup-node@v1
        with:
          node-version: "20.x"

      - name:  Hexo
        run: |
          export TZ='Asia/Shanghai'
          npm install hexo-cli -g

      - name:  Hexo
        id: cache-npm
        uses: actions/cache@v3
        env:
          cache-name: cache-node-modules
        with:
          path: node_modules
          key: ${{ runner.os }}-build-${{ env.cache-name }}-${{ hashFiles('**/package-lock.json') }}
          restore-keys: |
            ${{ runner.os }}-build-${{ env.cache-name }}-
            ${{ runner.os }}-build-
            ${{ runner.os }}-

      - name: 
        if: ${{ steps.cache-npm.outputs.cache-hit != 'true' }}
        run: |
          npm install gulp-cli -g #gulp
          npm install --save

      - name: 
        run: |
          hexo clean
          hexo generate
          gulp

      - name: Github
        uses: JamesIves/github-pages-deploy-action@v4
        with:
          token: ${{ secrets.ACTIONS_DEPLOY_KEY }}
          repository-name: bengenseo/bengenseo.github.io
          branch: main
          folder: public
          commit-message: "${{ github.event.head_commit.message }} Updated By Github Actions"
```

## gulpfile.js

```js
const { src, dest, series } = require('gulp');
const cleanCSS = require('gulp-clean-css');
const uglify = require('gulp-uglify');
const concat = require('gulp-concat');
const fs = require('fs');


// Minify CSS files
function minifyCSS() {
    if (fs.existsSync('source/css') && fs.readdirSync('source/css').length > 0) {
        return src('source/css/*.css')
            .pipe(cleanCSS())
            .pipe(dest('public/css'));
    } else {
        return new Promise((resolve) => {
            console.log('No CSS files to minify.');
            resolve();
        });
    }
}

// Minify JS files
function minifyJS() {
    if (fs.existsSync('source/js') && fs.readdirSync('source/js').length > 0) {
        return src('source/js/*.js')
            .pipe(uglify())
            .pipe(dest('public/js'));
    } else {
        return new Promise((resolve) => {
            console.log('No JS files to minify.');
            resolve();
        });
    }
}

// Default task
exports.default = series(minifyCSS, minifyJS);
```

## CNAME

```
blog.sjooo.sbs
```

## themes//.gitkeep

### .gitkeep

```
mkdir -p themes/*
touch themes/*/.gitkeep
```

## JSON

### 

```
npm install hexo-generator-json-content --save
npm install hexo-generator-feed --save
```

### /_config.yml

```
#JSON
jsonContent:
  meta: false
  pages: false
  posts:
    title: true
    date: true
    path: true
    text: true
    raw: false
    content: false
    slug: false
    updated: false
    comments: false
    link: false
    permalink: false
    excerpt: false
    categories: false
    tags: true
#RSS
feed:
  type: atom
  path: atom.xml
  limit: 
  hub:
  content:
  content_limit: 
  content_limit_delim: ' '
  order_by: -date
```

## 

### 

```
npm install hexo-abbrlink --save
```

### _config.yml

```
abbrlink:
  alg: crc32  #  crc16  crc32
  rep: hex    #  dec  hex
permalink: posts/:abbrlink.html
```

## -

```
hexo init
npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
```

```
hexo d -g
```

## 

```
hexo cl
hexo g
hexo s
```

## 

```
hexo cl
hexo g
git init
git remote rm origin
git remote add origin git@github.com:bengenseo/bengenseo.github.io.git
git checkout -b main
git add .
git commit -m "github action update"
git push origin main
```

## 

```
git pull origin main
git add .
git commit -m "Merge remote changes"
git push origin main
```

## 

```
git remote rm origin
git remote add origin git@github.com:bengenseo/bengenseo.github.io.git
git checkout -b main
git add *
git commit -m "github action update"
git push origin main
```

## 

```
hexo cl
hexo g
git remote rm origin
git remote add origin git@github.com:bengenseo/bengenseo.github.io.git
git checkout -b main
git add *
git commit -m "github action update"
git push origin main --force
```
Post.raw:

```js
const { src, dest, series } = require('gulp');
const cleanCSS = require('gulp-clean-css');
const uglify = require('gulp-uglify');
const concat = require('gulp-concat');
const fs = require('fs');


// Minify CSS files
function minifyCSS() {
    if (fs.existsSync('source/css') && fs.readdirSync('source/css').length > 0) {
        return src('source/css/*.css')
            .pipe(cleanCSS())
            .pipe(dest('public/css'));
    } else {
        return new Promise((resolve) => {
            console.log('No CSS files to minify.');
            resolve();
        });
    }
}

// Minify JS files
function minifyJS() {
    if (fs.existsSync('source/js') && fs.readdirSync('source/js').length > 0) {
        return src('source/js/*.js')
            .pipe(uglify())
            .pipe(dest('public/js'));
    } else {
        return new Promise((resolve) => {
            console.log('No JS files to minify.');
            resolve();
        });
    }
}

// Default task
exports.default = series(minifyCSS, minifyJS);

```

### _config.yml

```
abbrlink:
  alg: crc32  #  crc16  crc32
  rep: hex    #  dec  hex
permalink: posts/:abbrlink.html
```

## -

```
hexo init
npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
```

```
hexo d -g
```

## 

```
hexo cl
hexo g
hexo s
```

## 

```
hexo cl
hexo g
git init
git remote rm origin
git remote add origin git@github.com:bengenseo/bengenseo.github.io.git
git checkout -b main
git add .
git commit -m "github action update"
git push origin main
```

```
git add .

```

## 

```

git remote add origin git@github.com:bengenseo/bengenseo.github.io.git

git add *
git commit -m "github action update"
git push origin main
```

## 

```
git remote rm origin
git remote add origin git@github.com:bengenseo/bengenseo.github.io.git
git checkout -b main
git add *
git commit -m "github action update"
git push origin main --force
```
